name.en: Chair of Programming Languages and Systems

structural_unit_name.en: Chair of Programming Languages and Systems

description.en: Principles of a relational database. SQL structure and syntax. Data Definition Language and Data Manipulating Language. Basic queries, filtering, grouping, aggregating. Views and means of controlling user access to the data. Enforcing referential integrity.
description.et: Relatsioonilise andmebaasi põhimõisted. SQL struktuur ja süntaks. Andmestruktuuride kirjeldamise (DDL) ja andmete muutmise keeled (DML). Lihtsad päringud, filtreerimine, grupeerimine, agregeerimine. Vaated ning andmetele ligipääsu piiramine. Andmeterviklikkus.

objectives.en: This course is designed to give an overview of a widespread database query language, SQL. The primary goal of this course is to give the student the necessary knowledge and skills to design and develop databases.No previous experience with databases is necessary, although the participants should be familiar with the use of spreadsheets and computers in modern society.
objectives.et: Anda ülevaade üldlevinud andmebaaside päringukeelest SQL. Loengukursuse põhieesmärgiks on anda tudengile vajalikud oskused andmebaasist andmete saamiseks, teisendamiseks ning filtreerimiseks; arendada struktuur-loogilist mõtlemist. Eelnevat kogemust töös andmebaasidega ei eeldata, küll aga peaksid osalejad olema kursis tabeltöötluse ning personaalarvuti kasutamisega.

learning_outcomes.en:
After this course the student will be able to:
* develop simple data models
* use SAP SQL Anywhere to develop a database and run SQL statements
* compose simple queries using SQL

grade_preconditions.et: Arvestuse saamiseks peab iga osa olema eraldi arvestatud.

resources.mandatory_materials: Database System Principles, Design and Implement" by Catherine Ricardo, Maxwell Macmillan
resources.recommended_materials:
1. J.Ullmann, J.Widom A First Course in Database Systems, Prentice-Hall, 1997.
2. J.Ullmann Principles of Database and Knowledge-Base Systems, Vol. I, II, 1989.
